hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I am a good friend to have at home.
🐕 I like to go for walks.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk from a bowl.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. Who am I?
I hop around and have long ears. What am I?
I oink and love to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like to play in the rain.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I roar and have a big mane. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am the king of the jungle.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass on the plains.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and make sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big and blue.
💦 I can hold my breath for a very long time.
🌊 I love to jump out of the water.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of tiny ice crystals.
🧣 You might need a scarf when I fall.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and shine in the sky. I make you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I come. What am I?
I move the trees and blow your hair. Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall off the trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm around.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?
I come after the rain, and I have many colors. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 People say there is gold at the end of me.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I'm very hot and dry, and you need lots of water. What kind of weather am I?

hints.text: 🔥 It is the opposite of cold

weather.question: Sometimes I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 It is best to be indoors when I'm around.

weather.question: I'm a frozen raindrop that falls from the sky. Sometimes there are many of us at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a type of ice.
🚗 Driving can be difficult when I am falling.

weather.question: I am a big storm with very strong winds that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I form over warm ocean water.
🌪️ I have a swirling center called an eye.
